posts.post_content:
Listed my Magie on eBay 

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&item=320384746383[/url]

The only reason that I am also listing this in the buy sell trade area is that any net 54 members I will look at offers of $9,000.00 cash and a card trade to make up the rest of the price.

Here are some of the prices over the past several years:

Robert Edwards April 28 2007 SGC 30 $11,750

Heritage Auction May 2 2008 SGC 30 $13,145

Mastro auctions Aug 28 2008 SGC 20 $10,200

Memory Lane Dec 13 2008 SGC 40 $17,625

SCP Auctions Jan 28 2009 PSA 2.5 $15,036

Huggins & Scott May 27 2009 SGC 10 $8,538



Thanks
Steve
